overview: In Vanity, Acclaimed actor / director Seth Gamble returns to the world of sophisticated visual erotica he's depicted in such stylish cinema core releases as Money and The Red Room. Produced by Axel Braun and featuring AVN Best New Starlet Blake Blossom and an A list cast. Vanity holds a darkly sensual mirror up to the situations women can face when excessive desires to be loved, admired or idolized by others manifest in relationships.
tagline: Beauty is fleeting, Fame is fickle, Perfection is forever
title: Vanity
